acceptable_credit_cards: The following credit cards are accepted: ${cards}

billing_confirm: Start your free trial with the current billing option above.
billing_creditcard_cvvhelptip: Select for an explanation of CVV.

cdnav_home_description: Select this to go to the Disney Plus home screen.
cdnav_originals_description: Select this to see titles exclusive to Disney Plus.
cdnav_profile: Profile Management. Currently logged in as ${user_profile}'s Profile.
cdnav_profile_description: Select this to switch profiles or update profile settings.
cdnav_rightnav: Navigate right or press back to close the navigation menu.
cdnav_search_description: Select this to search for a specific title.
cdnav_settings_description: Select this to access your account settings.
cdnav_watchlist_description: Select this to see titles you have added to your Watchlist.

cdsearch_functions_downnav_explore: Navigate down to explore collections of content.

cdsearch_pageload: On the Search & Explore Screen. Search by title, genre, or character.
cdsearch_results_pageload: In the search results grid. This grid is  ${total_tiles_wide} tiles wide and has ${total_rows} rows.
cdsearch_results_upnav: Navigate to the top of the grid for the search keyboard.
cdsearch_switch: Switch between letters and numbers. Currently in ${keyboard_mode}.
cdsettings_pcon: Parental Controls. Select this to setup parental controls for each profile
checkbox_hint: element is ${value}, tap twice to change the status
contentlanding_content_upnav: Navigate above content for category filters.

contentlanding_tabs_downnav: Navigate down for additional content within the ${active_tab}.
contenttile_interact: Select for details on this title.
continuewatching_episode: ${content_title}, season ${season_number}, episode ${episode_number}, ${episode_title}. You have ${time_left} minutes remaining.
continuewatching_movie: ${content_title}. You have ${time_left} minutes remaining. Select to continue watching.
continuewatching_newepisode: ${content_title}. Your next episode is, season ${season_number}, episode ${episode_number}, ${episode_title}. Select to continue watching.
createprofiles_pcon: Parental Controls. Select this to setup parental controls for each profile.
details_backnav: Press back on your remote to leave the details screen for ${content_title}.
details_download_remove: Remove the offline download for this title.
details_download_stop: Stop the offline download for this title.
details_episode_info: Get more info on season ${season_number}, episode ${episode_number}, ${episode_name}
details_fulldetails: ${content_title}. ${long_description}. Duration ${duration}. Released ${release_date}. Genres ${genre}. Rating ${rating}. Director ${director}. Starring ${starring}.
details_tabs: In the additional content tab selector on the details screen.
details_tabs_content_upnav: Navigate up to the additional content tabs.
details_tabs_details: Select to hear the full details of this title.
details_tabs_upnav: Navigate up to play this title.
details_watchlist: Add the current title to your Watchlist
details_watchlist_add_selected: This title has been added to your watchlist.
details_watchlist_interact: Select to add this title to your watch list.
details_watchlist_remove: Remove the current title from your watchlist.
details_watchlist_remove_interact: Select to remove this title from your watch list.
details_watchlist_remove_selected: This title has been removed from your watchlist.
detailtile: ${content_title}. Select this to play this title.
editprofiles_done: Done. Select this to save your profiles and leave this screen.

existingoneid_continue: Continue. Confirm your password and login.
existingoneid_showpassword: Show. Select this to show your password.
forgotpassword_validating: Validating your six digit code. Please wait.
home_heroarrow: Select this to see other featured content
home_navleft: Navigate all the way left or press back to access the navigation menu.

home_rowarrow: Select this to see more titles in ${row_title}.
image_brandlogos: Disney plus Pixar plus Marvel plus Star Wars plus National Geographic logos
index_button_interact: Select this to interact with this button.

index_toggle_interact: Select this to toggle this option.

mobilenav_more: More options. Access watchlist, settings, and change profiles.

onboarding_password_hidepassword: Your password is currently showing. Select this toggle to hide your password.

onboardinglanding_btn_login: Log in to your Disney Plus account.

pcon_kidstoggle: Toggle kids mode on or off for ${user_profile}'s profile.

profileeditor_applanguage: ${ui_language} is currently selected. Select this to choose a different app language.

profileeditor_cancel: Cancel. Select this to cancel all your changes and return to the profiles list.

profileeditor_navright: Navigate right to save this profile.
